fullText: Estelle Parsons and Stephen Spinella bring conviction and craft to their roles, but even their considerable skills cannot entirely overcome the play's fundamental flaws.
dtliExcerpt: Estelle Parsons and Stephen Spinella bring conviction and craft to their roles, but even their considerable skills cannot entirely overcome the play's fundamental flaws.
bwwExcerpt: Now 86, Ms. Parsons has lost little, if any, of her energy, and absolutely none of her ability to bring sustained, animated life to a well-drawn character...While the conversation occasionally strays into unprofitable byways, the play passes by breezily because Ms. Parsons is such fun to watch..."Wh...
